Description:
BRAND NEW, UNDER CONSTRUCTION
Calling all first home buyers and investors! Look no further this immaculate opportunity awaits!
This Frenken home offers you the very best of turn-key package inclusions with great lifestyle..
Featuring:
- 4 bed 2 bath 2 living and 2 car garages
- Colour concrete driveway
- Led down lights
- Quality Ceramic Tiles – entry/kitchen/wet areas
- Gas ducted heating
- Split system air-condition
- Letter box
- Clothes lines
- 2550 high ceilings
- 600MM Stainless steel appliances
- Dishwasher
- 20mm Stone bench tops to Kitchen
- Remote controlled Garage door
- Fencing as per estate requirement
Be sure to enquire quick as this won’t last long…..
NOTE: ALL PHOTOS ARE FOR ILLUSTRATIONS PURPOSE ONLY

Description:
Grand Living in Grandvue
Calling all first home buyers, astute investors and those wanting a spacious loving family home.
Located in the Grandvue Estate with breathtaking views, is this beautifully presented single level recently completed four bedroom home.
Upon entry, you are immediately drawn into the warmth, endless possibilities and future memories that this amazing home has to offer. From the front master bedroom with an enticing his and hers walk-in robe that includes an ensuite with a double vanity, to the three, YES THREE LIVING ZONES, ideal for the growing family and three rear additional bedrooms all with double built in robes; this family home is sure to impress.
Key features include stone benchtops, gas ducted heating, stainless steel kitchen appliances, butler’s pantry with sink, a mixture of carpet, tiled and floating timber flooring, remote controlled double garage and a rear alfresco area. This list could go on ..... and on; however, why not come and experience what this amazing home has to offer firsthand.
In addition, the property is also well positioned to all essential amenities, including being only minutes away from the Arena Shopping Centre, the prestigious and extremely popular St. Francis Xavier College, St. Claire’s primary school, easy access to the Cardinia train station and various bus stops, as well as all major arterial roads including the Princes Highway and the Princes Freeway.
Get in quick as this amazing opportunity won’t last long!

Description:
A Lifestyle of Convenience & Style
This young, stylish home offers a fortunate buyer the opportunity to live a lifestyle of luxury and ease. The home, that presents as new, boasts 2 bedrooms, kitchen overlooking dining and family room with vaulted ceilings and celestial windows. The full length, windows capture an abundance of light, a unique quality that sets the tone for this impeccable residence. Features ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a single, remote garage. Outdoor living offers a completely private courtyard setting, ideal for entertaining. This secure property will appeal to those seeking a lock and go lifestyle, with minimal maintenance. Located within close proximity to Beaconsfield and Officer townships makes for convenient living.

Description:
SOLD PRIOR TO AUCTION!
FIRST IMPRESSIONS LAST!
This property is an impressive 32 square designer family home, no expense has been spared with its display home quality upgrades. As you walk thru the large 2.7m double timber front doors you are greeted with grand 15ft feature ceilings that extends to the Study/Sitting room. The remainder of the home includes spacious 9ft ceilings. This home is a true open plan property with the kitchen overlooking the living spaces and Alfresco & dining areas.
* Large Open Kitchen with 40mm Waterfall feature benchtops, Spacious Walk in pantry & Upgraded Westinghouse appliances with a dual oven configuration ideal for true chefs of house. In addition the kitchen is topped off with Stylish European style cabinetry with soft close draws
* Master bedroom offers His and Hers walk in wardrobes as well as spacious en-suite other bedrooms are of generous size include WIR
* Large Corner block approx. 581 sqm Located in prime position of Park Central Estate, under 5 mins drive to local schools including however not limited to Maranatha Christian College, Officer high school & Officer Specialist School.
* Also moments away are other amenities such as Officer Station, Various established shopping centers and specialist shops as well as the up and coming retail development across the road.
* Park Central Avenue Estate features a large family orientated park, huge playground & BBQ Picnic areas
PLEASE NOTE: PHOTO ID IS REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS
TERMS: 10% DEPOSIT, BALANCE 30/45/60 DAYS

Description:
Location isn't important – its everything
Positioned in the Arena Estate, only a short stroll from the Shopping Centre with some excellent shops, supermarket and cafes, minutes away from public transport/Cardinia train station, M11 freeway access and with some of the best schools around, this home should be in your wish list. Featuring:
- 4 good-sized bedrooms, master with full ensuite and walk in robe
- Modern kitchen featuring stone island benchtop, 900mm cooktop, stainless steel appliances and ample storage
- Great alfresco with low maintenance garden
- Landscaped front yard with artificial turf
Other features include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double lock up garage with internal access, and a concrete slab around the house.
Please call Yogi Patel on 0451 719 161 to book a private viewing.
*Photo I.D. needed at inspections.*

Description:
Prestigious Contemporary Family Home
Set your sights on this prestigious Carlisle built family home in the highly sought-after Arcadia estate in Officer. The flawless home creates a spacious and modern ambience, fitted with exceptional fixtures and fittings throughout.
This sophisticated and stylish family home comprising of light filled open plan indoor and outdoor living with an additional formal living room and study servicing downstairs and a spacious rumpus room located upstairs.
To add to the amazing value, a designer kitchen tailored with 900mm stainless steel appliances, stone benches and butler’s pantry with ample storage.
The executive master bedroom is fitted with a huge walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity and stone benches and private balcony. Additional 3 bedrooms all containing built in robes and equipped with the main bathroom with stone benches.
If entertaining is what you like, then this entertaining area will complete your house hunting, flowing on from the main living is your entertaining area, with plenty of space for the kids to still play on the grass, with a land size of 504m2 (approx.) this does not become available often.
Evaporative heating and cooling, high ceilings, garden shed, separate powder room downstairs. Double remote control garage with internal and external access and easy to maintain landscaping.
Located in a prime location in Arcadia Officer, a highly sought after estate in the suburb, transport, freeways, shopping centres and schools. What could you possibly want more?
Call Nicola now to schedule an inspection today or see us at our opens! This one won’t last long.

Description:
Titled land in prime location!
Ideally located in the highly sought after "Savannah Estate", is this titled block, offering 14.5 meters (approx.) frontage perfect to build a home to fit the entire family.
With such a rare combination of country charm, generous green spaces and modern conveniences, there's no better place to create your very own home.
Land Features:
• Titled and ready to build
• Generous 424m2
• West Facing
• Overlooking massive "Savannah Officer Reserve"
This land is close to the below amenities:
• Melbourne CBD is just 45 minutes via the M1
• Officer Train Station 2km drive
• Bus No. 837, Brunt Road – 550m
• Beaconsfield Train Station – 2.4km
• Cardinia Train Station – 5.2km
• Monash Freeway & Princess Highway
Short drive to the below schools
• Maranatha Christian School Cardinia Campus – 1.1km
• Beaconsfield Primary School – 2.3km
• St Francis Xavier College – 2.1km
• Berwick Grammer School – 3.3km
• Haileybury College – 3.4km
• Monash University, Berwick Campus – 6.2km
Don't miss out on this opportunity to build your dream home or investment property, it won't last long. Call Naval or Irene today to discuss further.

Description:
First Home Buyers & Investors Please Stand Up
Attention all first home buyers and investors we have a property new to the market, which will give purchasers an opportunity to buy a home who have certain budgets they need to stick to.
Inside this 3 bedroom home, you'll instantly feel right at home due to the presentation and how fastidiously the home owners have maintained it. Downstairs you have an economical kitchen with all the bells and whistles that over looks a meals area and a huge lounge room that would make for awesome movie nights in.
If you are the entertaining type, outside has been given the royal treatment with a gorgeous courtyard that has been extensively decked making it easy to look after, which gives you more time back to enjoy a beer out there.
Upstairs provides the 3 bedroom with the master having a full ensuite for comfort and a kids retreat or study nook if you need that space. Three toilets, two bathrooms, double garage, heating and cooling, dishwasher and so much more make this property a perfect asset to an investors portfolio or a charming first home to buyers looking to get into this tough market.
Call LJ Hooker Narre Warren South today.

Description:
Oh Yeah Officer
This stunner is sure to sell quickly, so clear your schedule on Saturday between the open times and make your way down to this amazing property.
This young house is waiting and dying for someone like you to be the lucky one to call it home. It offers something very special and unique within its walls. It has 3 bedrooms, although at present, the front living area is being utilized as a bedroom, so if its a 4th bedroom you are after then this property has just what the doctor ordered. Using the front living area as a bedroom will still see you having 2 living areas remaining, which is sure to be more than enough room for the kids to grow.
Standouts of this property include-
3 or 4 Bedrooms
Master hosting its own ensuite and walk in robe
Huge rumpus at rear of home
Decked area under Portico
Ducted heating
Double remote garage with internal access
Split system for cooling
Outdoor living Alfresco
Room down the side of house for a work trailer, boat or small caravan
Close to Arena Shopping Center
Close to Cardinia Train Station
This property could be perfect for first home buyers, investors, or anyone looking to live in the truly amazing area that is Officer.

Description:
Family Entertainer
Understatedly elegant, light-filled interior in the much sought after Timbertop Estate and an increasingly popular location are all stand-out attributes of this remarkable family home.
Close to schools, walking distance to the park, medical facilities and sporting grounds, this property is sure to impress.
Meticulously presented, this home features 4 bedrooms, a sophisticated master with private ensuite and full walk in robe.
Two spacious living areas incorporating a rumpus/ theatre room complete with surround sound stereo speakers, large family area and open plan kitchen. Complete with Butler's pantry and a hidden bar.
Exemplary in design, the kitchen and living zones extend to a delightful alfresco timber decked area complete with built in BBQ area and gorgeous landscaped garden.
A separate yard area has been specifically designed with a luscious veggie patch, this area can easily be arranged to extend the lawn area or be kept as is to provide year round fresh from garden to table eating.
Other features include but are certainly not limited to; ducted heating, evaporative cooling, impressive LED feature lighting, internal access from garage, 10 x fixed cupboards in garage including additional shelving, outdoor shed, sunblinds to front facing windows, raked high ceilings.
Insights: 60 Timbertop Boulevard, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2017 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect starter or investment opportunity
Presented for sale for the first time, this striking four bedroom home is sure to impress the most astute investor or first home buyer. Conveniently located in the popular Arcadia Estate in Officer this home has everything on offer and presents exceptional value for money.
Upon entry be greeted by a long sweeping hallway with stunning high ceilings giving you the feeling of space and luxury throughout. The master bedroom is conveniently positioned to the front of the home and comprises a full ensuite with walk in robe. A second bathroom and three additional bedrooms are also on offer and are located to the rear.
The fully appointed kitchen is the central hub of the home and overlooks the open plan meals and family room. The kitchen also features stone bench top, dishwasher and quality stainless steel appliances. Exemplary in design, the kitchen and living zones extend to a delightful under cover alfresco, fantastic for all year round entertaining!
With additional features including gas ducted heating, split system A/C, double garage with remote and internal access, this home simply won't last! Location in paramount and this home has everything sitting right at your doorstep.
Currently tenanted on a periodical agreement for approx. $380 P/W, this
property is a walk up start for anyone wanting to add to their current investment portfolio or perfect for anyone looking to simply move in and enjoy for themselves.
To book your private inspection call Brad Townsend TODAY.

Description:
Peerless Elegance, Prized Location
Perfectly positioned directly across from what will be a state-of-the-art park & playground! This stylish home offers a quiet, tranquil and exquisite environment. All about life-style living, enjoying time with family & friends and not being burdened with arduous chores that present themselves with large block sizes. This is all about enjoying your life for today! Located in the ever-popular heart of Officer this innovative home is ready for you to simply move straight in and do absolutely nothing but enjoy! Expansive living and dining areas with a state of the art gourmet kitchen boasting Smeg appliances and white stone bench tops. The home is inundated with natural light. Featuring a grand sized master bedroom with stylish ensuite and large WIR and three further bedrooms, this is 5 Star living! With absolutely minimal garden maintenance required, more time can be enjoyed on recreational activities. Extra’s include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double car remote garage and more! Just moments from all amenities, Arcadia Estate is within close proximity to shopping centers, parks, Cardinia Train Station, public & private schools, along with easy access to the freeway - all adding to the recreational and family lifestyle benefits available here. Do not miss this opportunity to secure this home in an outstanding location!
